Title: Login Issue: Unable to Access Account
Description: Several users report that after entering valid credentials, the login page fails to redirect to the dashboard. This issue started after the latest update.

Title: Feature Request: Dark Mode Interface
Description: End users are asking for a dark mode option in the application to reduce eye strain during night-time usage. The request has been highly requested in user feedback.

Title: Bug: Data Synchronization Error
Description: Observed discrepancies between the data shown on the portal and the actual backend records. The error seems to occur after the daily data sync process.

Title: Performance Issue: Slow Loading Dashboard
Description: Users are experiencing delayed loading times on the dashboard during peak hours. An investigation into query optimization is required.

Title: Security Alert: Password Reset Vulnerability
Description: Multiple reports indicate that the password reset function might be vulnerable to unauthorized access, potentially exposing sensitive user data. Urgent review and patching are recommended.
